name: Jimmy Kimmel's Comedy Club
summary: Curated and designed by comedian, writer, producer and Emmy Award nominated TV host, the first-ever Jimmy Kimmelâs Comedy Club at The LINQ Promenade captures the spirit of Kimmel's hometown of Vegas with late-night comedy shows, surprise guests, memorabilia, and authentic concession-style cuisine.  Bar open daily, with comedy performances Thursday - Sunday at 8 p.m.

In 2017, Lawson made a big splash on NBC's "America's Got Talent" where he made it to the final ten contestants. Preacher also appeared on "Americaâs Got Talent: The Champions" where he was a top 5 finalist on NBC highest-rated season to date.

name: Nikki Glaser @ Jimmy Kimmel's Comedy Club
summary: July 4 - 7: Nikki continues to cement her status as a force in standup comedy, headlining in theaters and clubs across the country. Her first one-hour standup special, Perfect, premiered on Comedy Central in April 2016. More recently, her half-hour Netflix special, The Standups, premiered in July 2017 to rave reviews. Nikki also has a Sirius XM morning show, You Up with Nikki Glaser.

name: Beth Stelling at Jimmy Kimmel's Comedy Club
summary: June 6 - 9: Beth Stelling is a stand up comedian, writer and actress. You may have seen her latest Netflix special The Standups (season 1, episode 5 of the series) . She is a writer for Hulu's "I Love You, America with Sarah Silverman" and wrote for Judd Apatow's series "Crashing on HBO," as well as Another Period on Comedy Central.

name: Gina Brillon at Jimmy Kimmel's Comedy Club

Gina is the first Latina winner of NBCâs "Stand up for Diversity Showcase." The accomplished singer and writer debuted her special, "Pacifically Speaking," last fall.

name: John Heffron at Jimmy Kimmel's Comedy Club

The "Last Comic Standing" has since performed on "The Tonight Show," "Chelsea Lately," "The Late Late Show," HBO, and his Netflix special, "Middle Class Funny."

name: Orny Adams at Jimmy Kimmel's Comedy Club

Adams has appeared all over television, most notably on The Tonight Show, Late Night with David Letterman and The Conan OâBrien Show. And you might also recognize him as Coach from the TV show Teen Wolf which ran for six seasons.

name: Chris Distefano at Jimmy Kimmel's Comedy Club

Chris is a favorite on the standup festival circuit and can be seen performing almost every weekend at clubs and theaters across the country.
